en-US.STR_IP4_CONFIGURE_HELP: Indicate whether network address configured successfully or not.
en-US.STR_IP4_IP_ADDRESS_HELP: Enter IP address in dotted-decimal notation. Example: 192.168.10.12
en-US.STR_IP4_MASK_HELP: Enter NetMask in dotted-decimal notation. Example: 255.255.255.0
en-US.STR_IP4_GATEWAY_HELP: Enter Gateway in dotted-decimal notation. Example: 192.168.10.1
en-US.STR_IP4_DNS_HELP: Enter DNS Servers in dotted-decimal notation. Example: 192.168.10.8 192.168.10.9
